messages.content: I’m starting to worry that [NAME] is not okay
I think my worry would be if another dog attacks mine, they wouldn't be able to defend themselves
Wife just had our baby, and this story freaked me out. I can't imagine going through something like that.
I’m just worried about his attitude and approach with younger players. Edit-re worded
Yikes. This kind of freaks me out.
I have the worst memory ever. Idk if it's from all the weed I smoked but I also have a blank mind like all the time.
You know that mista mista lady? I think I just killed her. - [NAME]
That has gotten me killed a few times lately.
Same, ASMR is nightmarish. My skin crawls just thinking about it.
I wouldnt go that far, but paranoid schizophrenia can definitely do that to someone. Even mild social anxiety can also cause it, though
Yep. In Sixth grade a boy named [NAME] just stabbed me in the stomach with a pencil.
Same clothes and the door is black on the other side - looks so real!!
I don't feel so financially secure
oh, rich people loooooooooooooooooooove to prey on the poor, they couldn't bear not raping, mocking, humiliating, profiting from, the 99%
She's been fired and shamed out of existence. Good riddance.
Okay rude. Leave [NAME] alone and where he is please. I’ve been rooting for this kid since his first match.
Get back on your meds mate..You aren't funny at all...
The constant pressure definitely isn't helping. I'm already on anti-depressants, but I am terrified of PPD.
Our soil needs the help! That would be a really unpleasant job.
I literally cried out IS THAT MATT BERRY?!?!?!?!?!
